data.name: Demeo (Original Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description: Introducing fantasy beats to relax/study to, play at your next board game night or just blast in your headphones! You can now enjoy the magical tunes of Demeo anywhere. The soundtrack is published by Resolution Games and made by Linus Söderlund.
data.about_the_game: Introducing fantasy beats to relax/study to, play at your next board game night or just blast in your headphones! You can now enjoy the magical tunes of Demeo anywhere. The soundtrack is published by Resolution Games and made by Linus Söderlund.
